title: RoboFest 2025
location: SRM Institute of Science and Technology
shortDescription: SRMIST’s premier robotics and innovation festival, showcasing the best in robotics, AI, and automation through competitions, exhibitions, and technical challenges.
content: RoboFest is SRMIST’s flagship robotics and innovation event, attracting students and professionals from across the nation. Over three days of high-voltage tech battles, workshops, and showcases, RoboFest celebrates the spirit of engineering and creation.

Participants compete in high-stakes robotics challenges like Robo Wars, Line Followers, and Drone Racing. The event aims to nurture problem-solving, teamwork, and innovation through real-world robotics applications.
From beginners to seasoned robotics teams, RoboFest offers something for every innovator.

subEvents.name: Robo Wars
subEvents.description: High-intensity arena battles between custom-built robots designed for combat.

subEvents.name: Robo Soccer
subEvents.description: Autonomous robots compete in strategic soccer matches.

subEvents.name: Robo Sumo
subEvents.description: Traditional sumo wrestling adapted for autonomous robots.

subEvents.name: Line Follower
subEvents.description: Precision navigation challenge following complex paths.

subEvents.name: OBS Race
subEvents.description: Navigate through complex obstacle courses autonomously.

subEvents.name: Drone Race
subEvents.description: High-speed aerial racing with autonomous navigation.
